---
title: "r-data-exploration"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
View(diamonds)


#Explore data set 

names(diamonds) 
dim(diamonds) 
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)

#Create a basic ggplot scatterplot of diamond price as a function of size 

ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price  ))+ 
  geom_jitter() 

#Create a histogram 

ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat))+ 
  geom_histogram() 


```
